bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
eval(String(source.header).replace(/<.*?>/g,''));
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes('/sub/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.subList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option);
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.subList[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data;
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*by_time=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank_type=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comicList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name + (list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comicList) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/search/index?keyword=' + e + '&source=0&page={{page}}&size=20';
}(key));
</js>
